name: Deploy Web Projects to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'web-dev-projects/basics/rock-paper-scissor/**'
      - 'web-dev-projects/basics/tic-tac-toe/**' # Trigger when changes occur in both projects

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      # Checkout the repository
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      # Set up Node.js for both projects
      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: '16' # Adjust as necessary

      # Install dependencies for both projects
      - name: Install dependencies for both projects
        run: |
          cd web-dev-projects/basics/rock-paper-scissor
          npm install
          cd ../tic-tac-toe
          npm install

      # Build both projects
      - name: Build both projects
        run: |
          cd web-dev-projects/basics/rock-paper-scissor
          npm run build
          cd ../tic-tac-toe
          npm run build

      # Upload build artifacts
      - name: Upload build artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v1
        with:
          path: |
            web-dev-projects/basics/rock-paper-scissor/build
            web-dev-projects/basics/tic-tac-toe/build

      # Deploy to GitHub Pages
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v1
